description:
A Digimon that steals humans` motivation shows up. The Digimon, called FlaWizarmon, steals Tagiru`s motivation, leaving him limp and drained of energy. He`s left so listless, he can`t even make Gumdramon Digivolve. Meanwhile, FlaWizarmon continues to steal more and more people`s motivation. Taiki and Yuu, along with Shoutmon and the other Digimon, attempt to defeat FlaWizarmon and return Tagiru to normal. However, after absorbing Tagiru`s motivation, FlaWizarmon keeps getting back up no matter how many times they knock him down...!
What is the fate of Gumdramon, who`s caught in a major bind without his partner`s motivation...? Will Tagiru ever go back to being the super-motivated middle schooler he used to be?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tagiru Goes Limp?! Gumdramon`s in Trouble!!
Tagiru ga Funyafunya!? Gumdramon Dai Pinch!
タギルがふにゃふにゃ!?ガムドラモン大ピンチ!!
